name: Notion Travel Planner

features: Plan a single trip itinerary; Accommodation, restaurants, activities, places, transportation & travel check list; Everything in the free version; Unlimited trips and itineraries; Menu sidebar and action buttons; Travel expenses; Travel outfit planner and packing lists with item library; Travel journal; Travel destination wish list
